Action.author: techwritingwhiz
Action.body: Still waiting on confirmation. Moved due date.

Action.author: techwritingwhiz
Action.body: I received confirmation from another team member that we do not need to note those two items at this time. I will have the .md version of the release notes ready for a pull request in the morning.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: We don't know exact versions of this packages until we release the RC because this can be not just "+1" so if we will prepare release notes before actual RC build we can assume indy-node and sovrin versions only.

Action.author: techwritingwhiz
Action.body: The release notes are finished. The pull request is here: https://github.com/sovrin-foundation/sovrin/pull/53
